events.text: Where am I?  What is this place?
You have sinned.  You have now been teleported to the past.
You must prove worthy of mortality by passing the ultimate test, fighting your way to the present.
But, beware!  There are many obstacles in your way to the modern world!  This journey will not be as easy as you think it will be.
Enemies with special abilities will try to harm you!  Do stay safe!
For each level, you have a safe zone, denotated by flashy green blocks.  You have a limited time outside of the safe zone.  If you reach the limit, you fail.
A purple portal will bring you to your next challenge.
There are many more elements that you will have to find out for yourself.  Have fun.
Ok, sure.  Where do I begin my journey?
You will find the portal to your first challenge to the right.
